column2: Housing, water, electricity, gas and other fuels
Furnishings, household equipment and other goods and services related to the dwelling and property

Totals for Canada and by province/territory may not correspond to the Provincial and territorial economic accounts (PTEA) at certain times of the year, depending on the timing of releases for the Distributions of household economic accounts (DHEA) relative to the PTEA.
